article.title: Data Study
article.author: Jolley, J.L.
article.text: Information, whose handling is the topic of this book, is generated by change, and whatever is our unit of change is our unit of information. In a situation in which only three possible moves can be made, only three fundamental units of information can be found, no matter how complex a structure we may build upon them. Our topic is therefore a special sort of change, the change brought about in acquiring or keeping or transmitting elements of knowledge.
